summary:
Tones down the annoying ringing sound that loops while you have Restoration Magic equipped.

As requested by imawhalenotadoctor on Reddit here: 
http://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/seqj8/request_remove_the_idle_noise_from_restoration/
descriptionHtml:
Name: Quieter Restoration Magic
Version: 1.0
Date: 4/18/2012
Category: Sound
Recommended: Nexus Mod Manager
Author(s): Verteiron
Requested by: imawhalenotadoctor on Reddit
http://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/seqj8/request_remove_the_idle_noise_from_restoration/

Description
===========
This mod simply replaces the Restoration Magic draw/sheathe sound with a less shrill version. The loop is now a very quiet rushing noise, rather than continuous chiming.

Incompatibility
===============
None, as far as I know. Might screw up another mod that modified magic sound effects, but only if they change Restoration\'s draw/sheathe sound.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None

Todo
====
Possibly offer a version that mutes all Restoration chiming.


Installation
=======

1. Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to Skyrim\'s Data folder.
2. Start Skyrim, click Data Files, and enable the QuieterRestorationDrawnSound.esp file.

Or simply use Nexus Mod Manager. ;)

Uninstall
=========


1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the QuieterRestorationDrawnSound.esp file.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Skyrim\\Data\\QuieterRestorationDrawnSound.esp 
Skyrim\\Data\\Sound\\FX\\MAG\\Restoration\\mag_restoration_drawsheathe_muted_lpm.wav

Or just use Nexus Mod Manager.

Upgrade
=======
Just overwrite everything, no problem.

History
=======
1.0, 2012/04/18 â€“ Initial release to Nexus and Steam.

Contact
=======
verteiron@gmail.com

Credits
=======
Thanks to imawhalenotadoctor on Reddit for requestion this mod.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the Creation Kit.
Thanks to Valve for providing an easy way to take my first baby steps in mod publishing.
Thanks to NexusMods for showing me the RIGHT way to publish mods.

Tools Used
==========
Audacity 2.0
Wavosaur.1.0.6.0(en)
7-Zip
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Creation Kit

Licensing/Legal
===============

Do whatever you want with this mod.
author: Verteiron
